front.title: A RELOAD Usage for Distributed Conference Control (DisCo)

abstract.t: This document defines a RELOAD Usage for Distributed Conference Control (DisCo) with SIP. DisCo splits the semantic of identifier and locator of a SIP conference URI using a new Kind data structure. Conference members are enabled to select conference controllers based on proximity awareness. DisCo proposes call delegation to balance load at focus peers. The document addresses also aspects of security and trust, as well as compatibility for conference unaware clients.
